item.description:
I have put together a fantastic Scenic Ireland trip! Four nights and five days in Dublin ...including airfare from NYC to Dublin, 4 nights lodging at a four star hotel. This package also includes a full Irish breakfast each day. All this for $517.92, dbl occ. (all taxes and departure fees included). What a bargain!!!

I can arrange for sightseeing at an additional fee. All interested parties should respond ASAP to Terri ...203-808-5829. Or send me an email ...terri0417@yahoo.com. A $150.00 deposit is required at the time of your booking.Full Payment will be due in about a month.

As for the sightseeing, once a group has been established, we will meet and decide what sightseeing tours we would like to add. I will also keep this group to a maximum of 20 people.

So...this is indeed a bargain! But you must act soon to get this price!!! It is sure to sell out quickly. I look forward to hearing from interested parties...

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Scenic Dublin, Ireland Trip...4 nts/5 days
